attributes.action: ensure road using cyclists are licenced and insured
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cyclists should be trained and/or licensed to use their bicycle on a public road.  A valid driving licence would suffice, or a version specifically for cyclists.  
By allowing someone without training in the highway code and road laws we present a potential hazard to legal road users.
Also if cyclists are to use roads they must recognise the danger and responsibility that comes with the territory and should have insurance to cover any accident or damage they may be unfortunate enough to experience.
